name: Running Late (sahil)
description:
You woke up late, you have limited time to take what is most important to you. You don't have much time, you're running late!

A game built during  PMI Game-A-Thon 2021. This is an early prototype for testing an idea for some future project. 

Your feedback is much appreciated, hope you like the game <3

Developers: Sahil (https://github.com/soilshubham) & Ankur (https://github.com/notAnkur)
